A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Look at all of these people willing to look past HUGE plot holes\, bad writing\, and extremely forced humor during serious scenes. Are you guys kidding? Leia is now Superman? No backstory for the main antagonist??? This director really messed up a perfectly cooked dish with all the right ingredients that JJ Abrams provided. You fans will eat up anything that has the name Star Wars on it and ask for more... You sheep are exactly the reason Disney will be creating more touchy feel good Jedi movies from here on out. This movie\, and I fear the ones to come\, will forever have an antagonist problem.....
